evolution_stages.conversation_summary: 1) Problems discussed: Lisa's fear of presenting in large lecture halls, leading to anxiety and blanking during presentations. 2) Solutions offered/accepted: Practicing in a simulated environment, using grounding techniques (holding a pen, focusing on the back wall), and preparing a keyword cheat sheet. 3) Student's response to solutions: Initially skeptical but agreed to try practicing in a real lecture hall and using the pen trick. 4) Evidence of progress/improvement: Lisa stood up and practiced her opening sentences, acknowledged the usefulness of the pen trick, and planned to use a keyword cheat sheet during her presentation.

behaviors_detailed.Procrastinates on assignments: Delaying work until the last minute

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: 1) Problems discussed: Lisa's fear of public speaking in large lecture halls, particularly for her upcoming research presentation, and her dismissive attitude towards social skills. 2) Solutions offered/accepted: Practicing in a simulated environment, using physical anchors (pen), reframing audience perception, and preparing cheat sheets. 3) Student's response to solutions: Initially skeptical but willing to try practical methods like practicing in a real lecture hall and using a pen to ground herself. 4) Evidence of progress/improvement: Lisa stood up and practiced her presentation sentences aloud, acknowledged the potential effectiveness of the pen technique, and considered practicing in an actual lecture hall to familiarize herself with the environment.
